Gul'dan.name: Fel Flame
Gul'dan.description: Release a wave of flame, dealing 200 (+4.5% per level) damage to enemies.

Gul'dan.name: Drain Life
Gul'dan.description: Drain the life from an enemy over 3 seconds, dealing 132 (+4% per level) damage per second and healing Gul'dan for 188 (+4% per level) Health per second.

Gul'dan.name: Corruption
Gul'dan.description: Call forth three bursts of shadow energy, dealing 204 (+4.5% per level) damage over 6 seconds. Stacks 3 times.

Gul'dan.name: Horrify
Gul'dan.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

Gul'dan.name: Rain of Destruction
Gul'dan.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

Gul'dan.name: Life Tap
Gul'dan.description: Gul'dan does not regenerate Mana.  Activate to restore 25% mana at a cost of 222 Life.

1.name: Pursuit of Flame
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Fel Flame. Reward: Fel Flame's radius is increased by 10%.

1.name: Glyph of Drain Life
1.description: Increases the cast range of Drain Life by 25%.

1.name: Echoed Corruption
1.description: Quest: Hit 40 enemy Heroes with Corruption. Reward: After the third strike, Corruption strikes 3 times in the opposite direction.

1.name: Chaotic Energy
1.description: Quest: Gathering a Regen Globe causes your next Basic Ability with a Mana cost to refund 40 Mana. Reward: After Gathering 20 Regen Globes your Basic Ability Mana costs are permanently reduced by 20.

4.name: Health Funnel
4.description: If an enemy dies while under the effect of Drain Life, the cooldown is instantly refreshed.

4.name: Consume Soul
4.description: Instantly kill an enemy Minion and heal for 365 (+4% per level) Health. Stores 2 charges.

7.name: Bound by Shadow
7.description: Each enemy Hero hit with Fel Flame reduces the cooldown of Corruption by 1 second.

7.name: Devour the Frail
7.description: Drain Life deals 50% more damage to enemies below 50% Health.

7.name: Curse of Exhaustion
7.description: Upon expiration, Corruption slows enemy Movement Speed by 50% for 2.5 seconds.

7.name: Hunger for Power
7.description: Increases Ability Power by 15% but reduces healing received from allies by 25%.

10.name: Horrify
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, deal 120 (+4% per level) damage and fear enemy Heroes in the area for 2 seconds.

10.name: Rain of Destruction
10.description: Summon a rain of meteors in an area for 7 seconds. Each meteor deals 165 (+4% per level) damage in a small area.

13.name: Fel Armor
13.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Fel Flame grants 40 Spell Armor for 2.5 seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by 40%.

13.name: Harvest Life
13.description: Drain Life heals for 50% more Health when used on Heroes.

13.name: Dark Bargain
13.description: Gul'dan's maximum Health is permanently increased by 25% but his Death Respawn time is increased by 15 seconds.

13.name: Healthstone
13.description: Activate to heal for 25% of Gul'dan's maximum Health.

16.name: Rampant Hellfire
16.description: Fel Flame's damage is increased by 8% for 5 seconds when hitting an enemy Hero. This can stack up to 5 times.

16.name: Ruinous Affliction
16.description: Corruption deals an additional 78 (+4% per level) damage on impact. If the enemy is hit by all three strikes, the third strike deals 233 (+4% per level) damage.

16.name: Darkness Within
16.description: After using Life Tap, the next Ability Gul'dan casts has 25% increased Ability Power.

20.name: Haunt
20.description: Increases the duration of Horrify by 1 second, and while Feared, enemies lose 25 Armor, causing them to take 25% increased damage.

20.name: Deep Impact
20.description: Rain of Destruction slows enemies Movement Speed by 90% for 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Demonic Circle
20.description: Summon a Demonic Circle at Gul'dan's location. Activate to teleport Gul'dan to the Demonic Circle.
